name: ai-prompt-detector
description: Auto-exports GitHub Copilot Chat to SpecStory documentation + instant AI prompt detection with quality verification notifications
_noDuplicatePromptSuppression: DO NOT REMOVE. Never reintroduce duplicate prompt suppression (if (text === lastSubmittedText) return). It froze counter at 1 and broke Enter variants.
_preserveActivityBarSections: DO NOT REMOVE viewsContainers.activitybar (specstory-activity) nor views.specstory-activity entries. Their removal hides the Activity Bar icon and is a regression.

ai-prompt-detector.maxPrompts.description: Maximum number of prompts to display

keybindings.when: inChatInput || chatInputFocus || chatEditingInputFocus || chatInputEditorFocus || interactiveSessionFocus || chatViewFocus || github.copilot.chat.inputFocus || inlineChatFocused || inlineChatVisible
